sentence: In early trading on Thursday, shares of Visa topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.5%.
Year to date, Visa registers a 34.2% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is General Electric, trading down 2.1%.
General Electric is lower by about 22.8% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Goldman Sachs Group, trading down 0.8%, and Home Depot, trading up 1.2% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
